string-array.name: message_reply
string-array.item: Hi My friend \ How are you \ \ \
Super good, thank you friend! It\'s great to talk with you today \
Basically, I\'m the coolest monster in the world \
I\'m from Palermo, Italy. But.. long time I haven\'t been home \ \
You can guess haha... \ \ \
It\'s just a koke bro \ \, I\'m still alive. I\'m traveling all over Europe and I post my trip on Instagram every day, Do you know my Insta?
monster.man is my Instagram. Follow me and travel all over Europe with me \ \
It is quite hard to say exactly but i became famous since 2023
I\'m so sad, nobody answers my call. I just wanna talk \ \
It\'s impossible. But..^. I threatened them that they would have to turn into monster.. cant\'t blame me.. it\'s their fault! No on accepts my phone
I love your lips \ . It\'s delicious hahaha
Family Guys hehehe \ \ \

I\'m not a joker but let me think about this joke. \ \ Yesterday I was so bored, I saw an ant in my kitchen and i placed few sugar cubes in front of her. She had some and went to tell her friends and I quickly hid the suger cubes because I wanted them to think that she is a liar \ \
OMG! So cute, thank your friend mee to i love you... big heart \ \
I like traveling listening to music, and buying shoes \
Really? OMG I love you so much \ \ \ \
Yes of course, let be Friends forever
Very ease, I just called my character Holly with a powerfull costume \
I love this application so much \\, if you like it too give me 5 start and cute comment
Thank you for this chat. I with repeat this conversation. \ \
Famili Guys hehehe \\
Welcoome, it\'s nice to speak with you today \ \ \
